name: Last One Standing: Tiny Panda Barrage
name_original: Last One Standing: Tiny Panda Barrage
description:
Made for GMC Jam 16 where the theme was "Big and Small", the handicap was "The protagonist is a failure" and the secret word was "Panda".

Play as a tiny little panda bear with a machine gun, firing endlessly at a giant robotic red panda. The red panda attempts to destroy you with bombs, lasers and fire breath.

You can never win (the protagonist is a failure, right?) but you can rack up a decent high score!
